title: Report for Colombo
brief_description: A report on the Colombo Plan, showing the services and facilities it is offering to the countries of south-east Asia. Shows visits of Indian, Pakistani and Ceylonese students and scientists to Australia; Asian students studying in Australian schools, technical colleges and universities; shipment of food, materials and equipment to south-east Asia.
